abstract: On a low-rated Thursday night of network television, CBS edged past ABC to rank No. 1 in the ratings during prime time.
snippet: On a low-rated Thursday night of network television, CBS edged past ABC to rank No. 1 in the ratings during prime time.
lead_paragraph: On a low-rated Thursday night of network television, CBS edged past ABC to rank No. 1 in the ratings during prime time. The network earned the most viewers during both the 8 and 9 p.m. hours, benefiting from solid audiences for its mainstays “Survivor” and “CSI,” which earned 11.4 million and 14.5 million, respectively, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘Harper’s Island’ Trails Time Slot Competitors
